name: Press play on tape (Road To Nogames)
name_original: Press play on tape (Road To Nogames)
description:
Help your C64 play and rewind some copied tapes.

During rewind huge bosses arise.

3 levels, some retro reference

enjoy! :)

* Brackeys 2020.2 Game-Jam submission (1 week jam in real world, only 3 nights jam in Hyperspace :)
